fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Panic someone.

> Use any ability if the entire town is panicked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Panic is a status effect. People who are panicked will make their visitors and anyone who visits panicked. Panic cannot be removed until Mass Panic dies.

> Whenever the entire town is panicked, the town will be told “A feeling of Mass Panic has consumed the town! You must visit every night.”

> Whenever everyone has been panicked, everyone besides you will have Vulnerable defense. Everyone **must** visit every night. If someone does not have a visiting ability they can use, they will gain the ability to “Visit someone and do nothing.” that they can use in addition to their regular ability.

> The effects of Mass Panic end when Mass Panic dies.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill anyone who opposes you and your panic.
